description:
Area Specialist Northern proudly presents, this property is superbly maintained, easy care and very comfortable, even offering excellent rental returns for astute investors. With three bedrooms, a great sized kitchen with heaps of storage space and landscaped yards keeping them attractive and easy to maintain, you are surrounded by beautiful reserves and great shopping with amenities. Inspection of this home and its location is a must.

With the potential to develop (STCA) this home caters to 100 percent of the market with its versatility of being a great first home, stunning investment opportunity and a very profitable development site!

This Property features:

• Master bedroom with built-in robe
• Two additional bedrooms all with built-in robes
• A central main bathroom
• Spacious kitchen with ample cupboard space
• Formal dining/meals
• Laundry
• Split system
• Double lockup garage

Located just minutes away from Meadow Heights Shopping Centre, Primary School & Mosque along with numerous cafes/restaurants, retail facilities, parks and an array of local transportation with easy access to Pascoe Vale Road and Somerton Road.

You have everything you need at a short distance such as the Meadow Heights Shopping Centre, Meadow Heights Primary School, Shankland Boulevard Reserve, Mosque, Roxburgh Park Shopping Village, Roxburgh Park Train Station.

This one is sure to be one not to be missed!

Contact Aman Nagra 0420 825 544 & Arvin Nagra 0402 713 612.

*We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective buyers are advised to carry out their own investigations.* Photos are for illustration purposes only.

Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
